text: Gwaa wului ma zii pɛ ka ʋɔnɔ kɔtuɗɛi laaʋɛ felegɔi pɛ. Ti-ɠaalaagiti ti la vɔa eyɛsu pɛ, ti-ɠaawaaiti ti la ɓega eyɛsu pɛ. Alu-o-alu nii seeliai, naa ɠa ɗa ɠula ga, ma niinɛi ɗa ʋu ga, mazɔlɔɔ GALA seizu ɲadegai ɠa ziɛi zeɠezu ná, é ɗa ti ɠɔ. Ti-ɠaawaai ɠa ɠɛ ga daamianigi, ti-ɠaalaagiti ta ɠɛ ga nu ɠɛdɛ salei.»
